fields.description:
Ti.UI.hideStatusbar behaves strangely on simulator. When it is commented out, the behaviour works as expected. 

You can see the effect on simulator in a video:http://89.213.252.250/Drop/Bug.mov

Effect observed on device: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2060175/IMG_3752.MOV

As mentioned, the effect is only observed in simulator, not on device. Issue was not reproduced in standalone app. 

I have the complete project.
fields.summary: iOS: hideStatusbar causes strange behavior on simulator, works well on device.
fields.environment:
Titanium SDK: Mobile 2.0.1
Platform OS: iOS SDK 5

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress for a number of years. Please open a new ticket if there are any problems.
